Question
========

Suppose you bought one lottery ticket with the number 856. The lottery tickets are numbered from 000 to 999. What is the probability that you will win?

Answerlist
----------

* 1/999
* 1/1000
* 1/856
* 1/143

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1/999: Incorrect
* 1/1000: Correct
* 1/856: Incorrect
* 1/143: Incorrect
